title: So since TT is retiring, here's an idea on how to reward players that have been playing it
body:
So we can be reminded who are the true players of Lol

100 games played - TT Icon featuring VileMaw with a tear
250 games played : TT ward skin upgraded (deadfall Ward with vilemaw's graps around it)
500 games played : TT Darius skin, since he always been stomping everyone there since he exists
1000 games played : Vilemaw's Breath Elise skin. Elise becomes a man with special animation

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5H0cgKJg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-26T02:52:44.254+0000)
>
> It's retiring? Since when?

At some time, Riot said that Twisted Treeline will be retiring at the end of the season. People who played TT for a long time will be rewarded, but it's not announced yet what the reward is.
Oh I thought you meant Teamfight Tactics. I was confused for a second.
I think deleting that toxic game mode is probably good enough reward
